body_html:
thanks @gunan, I'm not seeing the new pip packages at https://pypi.python.org/pypi/tf-nightly-gpu yet.

Also, looks like there hasn't been any nightly GPU docker image for a while:
https://hub.docker.com/r/tensorflow/tensorflow/tags/

Is your CI/CD system currently on fire? :) Let me know if I can help.

body:
thanks @gunan, I'm not seeing the new pip packages at https://pypi.python.org/pypi/tf-nightly-gpu yet.

Also, looks like there hasn't been any nightly GPU docker image for a while:
https://hub.docker.com/r/tensorflow/tensorflow/tags/

Is your CI/CD system currently **on fire**? :) Let me know if I can help.
